verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5782>Behold<s%>, I will raise up against <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and against them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3820>Leb<s%> - <S%H6965>kamai<s%>, a <S%H7843>destroying<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, that shall <S%H2219>winnow<s%> <S%H1238>her<s%>; and they shall empty her <S%H776>land<s%>: for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> they shall be against her round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Against him that <S%H1869>bendeth<s%> let the <S%H1869>archer<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and against him that lifteth himself <S%H5927>up<s%> in his <S%H5630>coat<s%> of <S%H2550>mail<s%>: and spare ye not her young <S%H970>men<s%>; destroy ye <S%H2763>utterly<s%> all her <S%H6635>host<s%>.
And they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and thrust <S%H1856>through<s%> in her <S%H2351>streets<s%>.

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is not <S%H488>forsaken<s%>, nor <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, of his <S%H430>God<s%>, of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; though their <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H817>guilt<s%> against the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Flee <S%H5127>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H4422>save<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>; be not cut <S%H1826>off<s%> in her <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: for it is the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5360>vengeance<s%>; he will <S%H7999>render<s%> unto her a <S%H1576>recompense<s%>.

Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath been a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that made all the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7937>drunken<s%>: the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of her <S%H3196>wine<s%>; therefore the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H1984>mad<s%>.

Babylon <S%H894><s%> is <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>: <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H3947>her<s%>; take <S%H6875>balm<s%> for her <S%H4341>pain<s%>, if so be she may be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

We would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, but she is not <S%H7495>healed<s%>: <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3212>her<s%>, and let us go every <S%H376>one<s%> into his own <S%H776>country<s%>; for her <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> unto <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and is lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> even to the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>: <S%H935>come<s%>, and let us <S%H5608>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Make <S%H1305>sharp<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%>; hold <S%H4390>firm<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes<s%>; because his <S%H4209>purpose<s%> is against <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H5360>it<s%>: for it is the vengeance of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> against the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, make the <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H2388>strong<s%>, <S%H3559>set<s%> the <S%H8104>watchmen<s%>, <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H693>ambushes<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath both <S%H2161>purposed<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> that which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> concerning the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

O thou that <S%H7931>dwellest<s%> upon <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H214>treasures<s%>, thine <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H520>measure<s%> of thy <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself<s%>, <S%H4390>saying<s%>, Surely I will fill thee with <S%H120>men<s%>, as with the <S%H3218>canker-worm<s%>; and they shall lift <S%H6030>up<s%> a shout against <S%H1959>thee<s%>.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power<s%>, he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> hath he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>:

when he <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, there is a <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and he causeth the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.

Every <S%H120>man<s%> is become <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and is without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; every <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> is put to <S%H3001>shame<s%> by his <S%H6459>image<s%>; for his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>, and there is no breath in <S%H7307>them<s%>.
They are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, a <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>delusion<s%>: in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like <S%H3335>these<s%>; for he is the former of all <S%H7626>things<s%>; and Israel is the tribe of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Thou art my <S%H4661>battle-axe<s%> and <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>: and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and with thee will I <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>;
and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%>;

and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and him that <S%H7392>rideth<s%> <S%H5310>therein<s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>; and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> man and the <S%H5288>youth<s%>; and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the young <S%H970>man<s%> and the <S%H1330>virgin<s%>;

and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> and his <S%H5739>flock<s%>; and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H406>husbandman<s%> and his yoke of <S%H6776>oxen<s%>; and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>deputies<s%>.

And I will <S%H7999>render<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and to all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> all their <S%H7451>evil<s%> that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Behold <S%H4889><s%>, I am against thee, O destroying <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which <S%H7843>destroyest<s%> all the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H1556>thee<s%>, and roll thee down from the <S%H5553>rocks<s%>, and will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

And they shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> of thee a <S%H68>stone<s%> for a <S%H6438>corner<s%>, nor a <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H4146>foundations<s%>; but thou shalt be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Set ye <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H6942>prepare<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> against <S%H8085>her<s%>, call together against her the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat<s%>, <S%H4508>Minni<s%>, and <S%H813>Ashkenaz<s%>: <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H2951>marshal<s%> against <S%H5483>her<s%>; cause the horses to come <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H5569>rough<s%> <S%H3218>canker-worm<s%>.

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> against her the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes<s%>, the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5461>thereof<s%>, and all the deputies <S%H776>thereof<s%>, and all the land of their <S%H4475>dominion<s%>.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>trembleth<s%> and is in <S%H2342>pain<s%>; for the <S%H4284>purposes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon<s%> do <S%H6965>stand<s%>, to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.

The mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> have <S%H2308>forborne<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%>, they <S%H3427>remain<s%> in their <S%H4679>strongholds<s%>; their <S%H1369>might<s%> hath <S%H5405>failed<s%>; they are become as <S%H802>women<s%>: her <S%H4908>dwelling-places<s%> are set on <S%H3341>fire<s%>; her <S%H1280>bars<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%>.

One <S%H7323>post<s%> shall <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7323>another<s%>, and one <S%H5046>messenger<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5046>another<s%>, to <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> that his <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H3920>taken<s%> on every <S%H7097>quarter<s%>:

and the <S%H4569>passages<s%> are <S%H8610>seized<s%>, and the <S%H98>reeds<s%> they have <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> are <S%H926>affrighted<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is like a <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> it is <S%H4592>trodden<s%>; yet a little while, and the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> shall come for <S%H935>her<s%>.

Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H2000>me<s%>, he hath crushed <S%H3322>me<s%>, he hath made me an <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, he <S%H8577>hath<s%>, like a monster, swallowed me <S%H1104>up<s%>, he hath <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3770>maw<s%> with my <S%H5730>delicacies<s%>; he hath cast me <S%H1740>out<s%>.

The <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to me and to my <S%H7607>flesh<s%> be upon <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, shall the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>; <S%H1818>and<s%>, My blood be upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>, shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H7378>Behold<s%>, I will plead thy <S%H7379>cause<s%>, and take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> for <S%H5360>thee<s%>; and I will dry <S%H2717>up<s%> her <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and make her <S%H4726>fountain<s%> <S%H3001>dry<s%>.

And <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall become <S%H1530>heaps<s%>, a <S%H4583>dwelling-place<s%> for <S%H8577>jackals<s%>, an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.
They shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> like young <S%H3715>lions<s%>; they shall <S%H5286>growl<s%> as <S%H738>lions<s%>' <S%H1484>whelps<s%>.

When they are <S%H2527>heated<s%>, I will <S%H7896>make<s%> their <S%H4960>feast<s%>, and I will make them <S%H7937>drunken<s%>, that they may <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and not <S%H6974>wake<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
I will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H3733>lambs<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter<s%>, like <S%H352>rams<s%> with <S%H6260>he-goats<s%>.

How is <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> <S%H3920>taken<s%>! and the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8610>seized<s%>! how is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>!
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> upon <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; she is <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the waves <S%H1530>thereof<s%>.

Her <S%H5892>cities<s%> are become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and a <S%H6160>desert<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> wherein no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%>, neither doth any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H2004>thereby<s%>.

And I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> upon <S%H1078>Bel<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and I will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that which he hath swallowed <S%H1105>up<s%>; and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall not flow any more unto <S%H2346>him<s%>: yea, the wall of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>.

My <S%H5971>people<s%>, go ye <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4422>her<s%>, and save <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And let not your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7401>faint<s%>, neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye for the <S%H8052>tidings<s%> that shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>; for <S%H8052>tidings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> that in another <S%H8141>year<s%> shall come <S%H8052>tidings<s%>, and <S%H2555>violence<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H4910>ruler<s%> against <S%H4910>ruler<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, that I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> upon the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and her whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H954>confounded<s%>; and all her <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>her<s%>.

Then the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and all that is <S%H7442>therein<s%>, shall sing for joy over <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; for the <S%H7703>destroyers<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto her from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

As <S%H1571><s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath caused the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%>, so at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of all the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Ye that have <S%H6405>escaped<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5975>ye<s%>, stand not still; <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> from <S%H7350>afar<s%>, and let <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> into your <S%H3824>mind<s%>.

We are <S%H954>confounded<s%>, because we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; <S%H3639>confusion<s%> hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> our <S%H6440>faces<s%>: for <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> upon her graven <S%H6456>images<s%>; and through all her <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall <S%H602>groan<s%>.

Though <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and though she should <S%H1219>fortify<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength<s%>, <S%H227>yet<s%> from me shall <S%H7703>destroyers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H5002>her<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H2201>cry<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>!

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> layeth <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7703>waste<s%>, and <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> out of her the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>; and their <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H1993>roar<s%> like <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>; the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H5414>uttered<s%>:
